howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Quick steps to get insightful answers

items.title: Upload Image
items.description: Choose an image by dragging, dropping, or browsing through your files in JPG, PNG, or WebP format.

items.title: Ask a Question
items.description: Pose a question related to the image content; our AI instantly begins analyzing.

items.title: Receive Answer
items.description: View the response showcased alongside your image for convenient reference.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common inquiries about AI Visual Question Answering

items.title: What types of questions can I ask?
items.description: You can inquire about various elements in your images, such as identifying objects, colors, quantities, and more. Our AI is trained to understand and interpret a wide range of visual queries.

items.title: Is there a limit on the number of images I can analyze?
items.description: No, you can upload and analyze as many images as you like. Each user receives daily limits for different features, so you can make the most out of the service.

items.title: Can I use the answers for commercial purposes?
items.description: Yes, paid users can utilize the responses for commercial endeavors. Free-tier users can engage with the service for personal use only.

items.title: How is my data protected?
items.description: All image processing happens directly in your browser. Your questions and images are not saved or uploaded to external servers, ensuring your privacy is always maintained.

footer.heading: Ready to Get Insightful Answers About Your Images?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and experience the convenience firsthand. No sign-up required.
